overview: It only takes one second for your future to change. In one hour, everything in your world could turn upside down. If this is the case how much do you think could happen in one day? Zab a writer is travelling back to her hometown; Pangasinan, for a project that she never knew could change her life. Aris, used to living each day just as it was, didnâ€™t expect this day would be different. As they share the road together, filled with laughter, adventures, and stories, the two will realize what they have been missing all along; that there is more to life that what they think.
title: Duyog
